long_desc.thetext:
Created an attachment (id=1074) Add ereject support in timsieved
Hello,
This patch makes timsieved promote and understand the "ereject" extension. It generates bytecode for ereject. Cyrus' imap implement executes "ereject" in the same way "reject" is run.
Please note, that sieve/message.c:do_ereject call directly do_reject. The same applies for sieve/test.c:ereject and imap/lmtp_sieve.c:sieve_ereject .

Created an attachment (id=1406) gzip of patches that provide SMTP-time ereject of incoming messages
Tested on FreeBSD 7.2 system, applied after FreeBSD patches.

attachment.desc: gzip of patches that provide SMTP-time ereject of incoming messages
